The richness and beauty of the world can only be amplified by looking at it through our own unique lenses. This Seattle Native, raised within the beautiful landscape and diverse region that encompasses all of the Pacific Northwest, Paul learned something very important; there was so much that he wanted to do and see in this life and that there was something incredible about creating images to tell a story. He started developing his love of the craftwork of photography at a young age, eventually turning his hobby, his passion, into a promising career. Paul has been attending one of the most prestigious institutions for photography, The Brooks Institute in Santa Barbara, and is scheduled to graduate Bachelorâ€™s of Arts in Professional Photography with an emphasis in Commercial Advertising in August of 2008. He aspires to establish himself as a talented and upcoming photographer in and around the Bay Area beginning in the Fall of 2008.
